collectible.title: Zoe Zip-Up Hoodie
collectible.subtitle: 60% cotton, 40% polyester, 100% pure aegyo.
collectible.text:
Taken straight out of Spooky High (or Jesse Cox's store) this grimacing hoodie will let all of your friends know how quirky and creative you are!
Despite appearances, it manages to fit suitably on all bodies, from slim guys to chubby gals. How? Eldritch magic. Probably. Dunno.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Zoe where she loses.
